author: Tom Simonite
title: Newly Unemployed, and Labeling Photos for Pennies
description: People who've lost jobs and are stuck indoors are turning to crowd work—filling out online surveys and transcribing audio for less than the minimum wage.
content: B.C. Kowalski, a writer at the local weekly in Wausau, Wisconsin, was expecting a boost to his income this spring. He was set to begin selling ads for local businesses on a podcast hed launched on the side, Keep it Wausome. Then coronavirus restrictions shut … [+3566 chars]
